title: ZeeshanTrade
author: ZeeshanTrade
content: Is there is any way to mix the USDT so that it can't be tracked?Thanks

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Unfortunately there's no trusted and reputable mixer to mix USDT, if you search on google you may find few mixers claimed can mix USDT, but I advise you shouldn't use that.You can either convert your USDT to BTC using Bisq and then use Bitcoin mixer 2023 List Bitcoin Mixers Bitcoin Tumblers Websites or you convert your USDT to XMR.

comments.author: ZeeshanTrade
comments.created_time: October 01, 2023, 04:19:33 AMLast edit: October 01, 2023, 04:32:46 AM by ZeeshanTrade
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on October 01, 2023, 04:09:32 AM or you convert your USDT to XMR.How do i convert my USDT to XMR (i have them on trust wallet) and then where i mix the XMR ?

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on October 01, 2023, 04:19:33 AMHow do i convert my USDT to XMR (i have them on trust wallet) and then where i mix the XMR ?Try with this- https://pnnv.comI have used them a few times. They won't ask for KYC from you. That's what their forum representative said in their ANN.

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: I believe it is still possible to use Tornado Cash although you will likely encounter problems if you later try to send your mixed coins to a centralized service due to U.S. sanctions. If your USDT is on Ethereum there is Railgun which can be used to shield your tokens. You can use decentralized exchanges to make a few private swaps and then move those funds into an unshielded wallet.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on October 01, 2023, 04:00:26 AMIs there is any way to mix the USDT so that it can't be tracked?ThanksUnfortunately, there aren't any mixers for the USDT stablecoin, However, you can mix the coin using Instant exchanges and convert to XMR.I would recommend to you https://exch.cx/ as that will give you the best possible rates as compared to other instant exchanges. However, sometimes they are short in reserves for XMR.Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on October 01, 2023, 04:19:33 AMand then where i mix the XMR ?You do not need to mix your XMR. The XMR which you have cannot be traced as to where they come from and where they are deposited. That is why we call XMR, the privacy coin.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on October 01, 2023, 04:09:32 AMYou can either convert your USDT to BTC using Bisq and then use Bitcoin mixer 2023 List Bitcoin Mixers Bitcoin Tumblers Websites or you convert your USDT to XMR.If he will have to convert the USDT to bitcoin and then use a mixer to mix bitcoin, he will also have to convert the bitcoin back to USDT. That is a long process when he can just convert the USDT to monero and convert it back to monero which is a shorter process and the fee would be less than convert to bitcoin and using s mixer. The only time I prefer to use or involve bitcoin is when I want to mix bitcoin.Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on October 01, 2023, 04:19:33 AMHow do i convert my USDT to XMR (i have them on trust wallet) and then where i mix the XMR ?I did not see monero/USDT trading pair on Bisq. You can first convert the USDT to bitcoin on an instant exchange, then convert the bitcoin to monero on bisq.network, convert the monero back to bitcoin and exchange the bitcoin back to USDT on an instant exchange.To do that, you can use https://exch.cx/ for the instant exchangeUse https://bisq.network for the decentralized exchange. Or to make it simple, use Tor on https://exch.cx/ to convert it directly. But https://exch.cx/is an instant exchange.

comments.author: ZeeshanTrade
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on October 01, 2023, 07:09:24 AMOr to make it simple, use Tor on https://exch.cx/ to convert it directly. But https://exch.cx/is an instant exchange.You mean that i use TOR to open this exch.cx and convert my USDT to XMR and then again convert XMR to USDT (to a new address)?Also, i check that EXCH.CX does not have USDT trc20 ?

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: The solutions given above (going through XMR) should work but I must ask, who are you trying to hide your traces from? If it's just the average Joe, then using XMR might be a bit of an overkill, going through any exchange or a centralized service should sufficient.

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on October 01, 2023, 07:17:38 AMQuote from: _act_ on October 01, 2023, 07:09:24 AMOr to make it simple, use Tor on https://exch.cx/ to convert it directly. But https://exch.cx/is an instant exchange.You mean that i use TOR to open this exch.cx and convert my USDT to XMR and then again convert XMR to USDT (to a new address)?Also, i check that EXCH.CX does not have USDT trc20 ?Sideshift.ai, FixedFloat.com and SimpleSwap.io all support Tron version of USDT as well as Monero. I've used them all without KYC but if you read their terms of service they all mention the possibility of denying your exchange if you are suspected of criminal activity.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on October 01, 2023, 07:17:38 AMYou mean that i use TOR to open this exch.cx and convert my USDT to XMR and then again convert XMR to USDT (to a new address)?Also, i check that EXCH.CX does not have USDT trc20 ?The exchange does not have TRC20 USDT. I hope the exchange will support it, it is not that old and they will support more coins later. Only ERC20 USDT that the exchange is supporting for now. You can read what FinneysTrueVision posted, but you should know that coins can be seized on instant exchanges because they are centralized.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: How are you even thinking of mixing USDT my friend? Not possible. I know of no legitimate mixer that does so except maybe an instant exchange or cross chain bridge that could block your USDT at anytime they want. Why use USDT that is highly centralized and not censorship resistant. Please use Bitcoin or atleast monero.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on October 01, 2023, 04:00:26 AMIs there is any way to mix the USDT so that it can't be tracked?ThanksNever heard any of usdt mixers. Since its an erc20 too why not convert first to ethereum then mixed it then convert to usdt after that. I think its the same principle if you want to wash off your address and gain some stablecoins through ethereum network. If Im not mistaken tornado cash has a lot of option but didnt used or tried that out yet.

comments.author: Rimueng
comments.body: Quote from: ZeeshanTrade on October 01, 2023, 04:19:33 AMQuote from: Apocollapse on October 01, 2023, 04:09:32 AM or you convert your USDT to XMR.How do i convert my USDT to XMR (i have them on trust wallet) and then where i mix the XMR ?If asked whether USDT can be mixed? It is best to clarify the question first. USDT cannot be mixed with other coins unless you exchange it first on an exchange, otherwise I don't know. The question is why do you intend to hide it, because too large or want to set aside some USDT, sorry. Comply with your country laws or regulation when you register exchange. Even if you later want to exchange USDT for XMR. Some popular exchange platforms that allow this include Binance, Kraken, and KuCoin. Yes, almost all of them do KYC.
